root.name: Lips: Party Classics
root.description: OverviewLips: Party Classic was announced on December 3, 2009 and is now the 3rd English-language Lips game. This addition to the franchise adds 40 additional songs for you to scream your lungs out with.Gameplay Changes You sing in this video game - a lot For the first time in the Lips franchise, you are now able to use a regular USB microphone. Lips: Party Classic also contains a more complex version of the recording feature, first seen in Lips: Number One Hits. AchievementsAs per the norm with Lips add-on games, this game will have 250 gamer achievement points. Avatar AwardsAs with Lips: Number One Hits, this release has Avatar Awards. Biker Guy: Earn a Big Bang rating and perform all gestures in YMCA. Biker Gal: Earn a Big Bang rating and perform all gestures in YMCA. Teen Sensation: Earn a Big Bang rating and perform all gestures in I Think We're Alone Now. 80's Heartthrob: Earn a Big Bang rating and perform all gestures in I Think We're Alone Now.
